welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rio Cauto, Cuba! Get ready to be captivated by the charm of our beautiful city, known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Rio Cauto has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at C.M. de Cespedes Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at C.M. de Cespedes Airport offers exclusive services for premium passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sierra Maestra Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sierra Maestra Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
